wikipedia.title: Danger Mouse
wikipedia.extract:
Danger Mouse may refer to:

Danger Mouse (1981 TV series), a 1981 British animated television series
Danger Mouse (2015 TV series), a 2015 continuation of the British animated television series
Danger Mouse (musician) (born 1977), American musician, DJ and producer
DangerMouse, the nickname of David Morgan-Mar, an Australian physicist and webcomic pooker

opinions.details: 台译“鼠尾老大”，同名动画片译为“神勇小白鼠”
